sentences: Carl Edwin Brandt (15 August 1914 Sacramento, California â€“ 25 April 1991 Studio City, California) was an American musician who was prolific as a composer and arranger for recording artists, television, and film.
Of his many positions in Los Angeles, Brandt was a staff composer/arranger for Warner Bros.
After the war, he moved to Los Angeles and began composing and arranging music for television, film, and recording artists.
